metadata.description: Foundation Words - Enhanced with Engagement Features
metadata.pedagogical_focus: High-frequency foundation words with full engagement support
metadata.builds_on: CVC patterns and basic sight words

words.meaning_support: A furry pet that says meow
words.context_introduction: Maya found a furry friend that says 'meow.' Let's build the word for this pet...
words.completion_sentence: The orange CAT purred and rubbed against Maya's legs!
words.visual_context: üê± Furry pet that says meow
words.personal_connection_question: Do you have a cat or know someone who does?
words.story_connection: CAT appears in Maya's animal rescue adventure!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! CAT follows the consonant-vowel-consonant pattern that makes reading easier!

words.meaning_support: A friendly pet that barks and wags its tail
words.context_introduction: Sam's best friend has four legs, barks, and loves to fetch. Build the word...
words.completion_sentence: The golden DOG wagged its tail and brought Sam the ball!
words.visual_context: üêï Friendly pet that barks and plays
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite thing about dogs?
words.story_connection: DOG is the hero in Sam's rescue story!
words.celebration_message: Great job! DOG has that super-clear consonant-vowel-consonant sound!

words.meaning_support: The bright yellow star that lights up our day
words.context_introduction: Every morning, something bright and yellow appears in the sky. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The bright SUN warmed Maya's face as she explored the garden!
words.visual_context: ‚òÄÔ∏è Bright yellow star in our sky
words.personal_connection_question: When do you like to be outside in the sunshine?
words.story_connection: The SUN guides characters in outdoor adventure stories!
words.celebration_message: Brilliant! SUN is a perfect example of the short 'u' sound in CVC words!

words.meaning_support: Pages with words and pictures held together
words.context_introduction: Maya loves to read stories with pages full of adventures. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya opened her favorite BOOK and began reading about dragons!
words.visual_context: üìñ Pages with words and stories
words.personal_connection_question: What kind of books do you like to read?
words.story_connection: BOOK is how our story adventures begin!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! BOOK has the 'oo' sound that you hear in many words!

words.meaning_support: A tall plant with branches, leaves, and bark
words.context_introduction: In the forest, tall plants with branches reach toward the sky. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The old oak TREE had perfect branches for climbing!
words.visual_context: üå≥ Tall plant with branches and leaves
words.personal_connection_question: Have you ever climbed a tree or sat under one?
words.story_connection: TREE provides shade and hiding spots in adventure stories!
words.celebration_message: Amazing! TREE has the 'ee' vowel team that makes the long 'e' sound!

words.meaning_support: An animal that swims in water and breathes through gills
words.context_introduction: Under the waves, colorful animals swim and breathe water. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The bright orange FISH darted between the coral reefs!
words.visual_context: üê† Swimming animal that lives in water
words.personal_connection_question: Have you seen fish swimming in real life or pictures?
words.story_connection: FISH are the main characters in Maya's ocean adventure!
words.celebration_message: Super! FISH has the 'sh' sound made by two letters working together!

words.meaning_support: The bright circle we see in the night sky
words.context_introduction: At night, a bright silver circle shines down from the dark sky. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The full MOON lit up the path as Sam walked through the forest!
words.visual_context: üåô Bright circle in the night sky
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like looking at the moon at night?
words.story_connection: The MOON lights the way in nighttime adventures!
words.celebration_message: Wonderful! MOON has that long 'oo' sound that sounds just like the word!

words.meaning_support: A tiny bright light in the night sky
words.context_introduction: Thousands of tiny lights twinkle in the dark sky above. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya made a wish on the brightest STAR she could find!
words.visual_context: ‚≠ê Tiny bright light twinkling in space
words.personal_connection_question: Have you ever made a wish on a star?
words.story_connection: STAR guides space explorers in cosmic adventures!
words.celebration_message: Fantastic! STAR starts with the 'st' blend - two consonants that work together!

words.meaning_support: The place where you live with people you love
words.context_introduction: The warm, safe place where your family lives together. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: After their adventure, Maya and Sam were happy to return HOME!
words.visual_context: üè† Safe place where you live with family
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite thing about your home?
words.story_connection: HOME is where every adventure begins and ends!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! HOME has magic 'e' that makes the 'o' say its name!

words.meaning_support: The color of the sky and ocean
words.context_introduction: The color of a clear sky and deep ocean water. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The BLUE butterfly landed gently on Maya's shoulder!
words.visual_context: üíô Color of sky and ocean
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite blue thing in nature?
words.story_connection: BLUE appears in ocean and sky adventure stories!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! BLUE starts with the 'bl' blend and has a special 'ue' ending!

words.meaning_support: Feeling good, cheerful, and full of joy
words.context_introduction: When something wonderful happens, you feel cheerful and full of joy. Build this feeling word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam felt so HAPPY when he helped the lost puppy find its family!
words.visual_context: üòä Feeling joyful and cheerful
words.personal_connection_question: What makes you feel really happy?
words.story_connection: Characters feel HAPPY when they solve problems in stories!
words.celebration_message: Great job! HAPPY has two syllables and shows strong emotions!

words.meaning_support: The color of grass and leaves
words.context_introduction: The color you see in grass, leaves, and many plants. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: The GREEN frog hopped across the lily pad in the pond!
words.visual_context: üíö Color of grass and leaves
words.personal_connection_question: What green things do you see outside your window?
words.story_connection: GREEN appears in nature and garden adventures!
words.celebration_message: Awesome! GREEN has the 'gr' blend and 'ee' vowel team working together!

words.meaning_support: The clear liquid we drink to stay alive
words.context_introduction: The clear liquid that falls as rain and flows in rivers. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya filled her bottle with cool, clear WATER from the mountain stream!
words.visual_context: üíß Clear liquid we drink
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like to drink water or play in it more?
words.story_connection: WATER is essential for all outdoor adventures!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! WATER has two clear syllables: 'wa-ter'!

words.meaning_support: To enjoy something or think it's good
words.context_introduction: When you enjoy something or think it's really good. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam said 'I LIKE helping animals find their way home!'
words.visual_context: üëç To enjoy or think something is good
words.personal_connection_question: What activities do you really like to do?
words.story_connection: Characters LIKE different things that drive story adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! LIKE has the magic 'e' that makes the 'i' say its name!

words.meaning_support: To make something easier for someone
words.context_introduction: When you make something easier or better for someone else. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya was always ready to HELP her friends solve any problem!
words.visual_context: ü§ù Making things easier for someone
words.personal_connection_question: How do you like to help your friends or family?
words.story_connection: HELP is what heroes do in every great adventure!
words.celebration_message: Wonderful! HELP ends with the 'lp' blend - letters that work as a team!

words.meaning_support: A very strong feeling of caring about someone
words.context_introduction: The strongest, warmest feeling you have for people who matter most. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya's family showed their LOVE by cheering for her at every adventure!
words.visual_context: ‚ù§Ô∏è Strong caring feeling for special people
words.personal_connection_question: Who are the people you love most?
words.story_connection: LOVE motivates characters to be brave and kind!
words.celebration_message: Beautiful! LOVE has magic 'e' that makes the 'o' sound long and strong!

words.meaning_support: To have fun with games, toys, or friends
words.context_introduction: What you do when you're having fun with games, toys, or friends. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam and Maya love to PLAY together in the backyard after school!
words.visual_context: üéÆ Having fun with games or friends
words.personal_connection_question: What's your favorite way to play with friends?
words.story_connection: PLAY time often leads to the best adventures!
words.celebration_message: Great job! PLAY has the 'pl' blend and 'ay' vowel team!

words.meaning_support: Something that is nice, right, or well done
words.context_introduction: When something is nice, right, or done very well. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya felt GOOD about helping the baby bird back to its nest!
words.visual_context: üëå Something nice, right, or well done
words.personal_connection_question: When was the last time you felt really good about something you did?
words.story_connection: GOOD choices help characters succeed in stories!
words.celebration_message: Excellent! GOOD has the 'oo' vowel team that you also hear in 'book'!

words.meaning_support: To use your eyes to see something
words.context_introduction: What you do with your eyes when you want to see something clearly. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Sam said 'LOOK at that beautiful rainbow after the storm!'
words.visual_context: üëÄ Using your eyes to see
words.personal_connection_question: What's the most amazing thing you've ever looked at?
words.story_connection: Characters LOOK for clues and discoveries in adventures!
words.celebration_message: Perfect! LOOK has the same 'oo' sound as 'book' and 'good'!

words.meaning_support: To move very fast with your legs
words.context_introduction: Moving as fast as you can with your legs pumping hard. Build this word...
words.completion_sentence: Maya had to RUN fast to catch up with the runaway puppy!
words.visual_context: üèÉ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Moving very fast with your legs
words.personal_connection_question: Do you like to run fast or slow and steady?
words.story_connection: Characters RUN toward adventure and away from danger!
words.celebration_message: Amazing! RUN is a classic CVC word with that short 'u' sound!
